faqList.question: Is CSR Racing 2 heavy on phones?
faqList.answer: Yes. The realistic graphics and car details demand strong GPU performance and plenty of RAM.

faqList.question: Can CSR Racing 2 run at 60 FPS?
faqList.answer: Yes, on mid-range and flagship devices with Max FPS enabled. Low-end phones may stay closer to 30 FPS.

faqList.question: Why does CSR2 take so much storage?
faqList.answer: Each car, event, and update adds high-quality textures and animations. Those shiny cars arenâ€™t lightweight ğŸ˜….
